languages.text: "Его разум всегда умел приводить факты и выводы в такую гармонию, что в них возникала красота. Многие среди моей паствы находили его проповеди поэтичными".
"His mind has always been able to combine facts and conclusions into harmonious wholes that were nothing short of beautiful. Many among my flock found his sermons poetic."
languages.original_text: "Его разум всегда умел приводить факты и выводы в такую гармонию, что в них возникала красота. Многие среди моей паствы находили его проповеди поэтичными".

traits.locale_text: "His mind was always able to combine facts and conclusions into harmonious wholes that were nothing short of beautiful. Many among my flock found his sermons poetic."
"His mind was always able to combine facts and conclusions into harmonious wholes that were nothing short of beautiful. Many among my flock found his sermons poetic."
"His mind always knew how to combine facts and conclusions into harmonious wholes that were nothing short of beautiful. Many among my flock found his sermons poetic."
"His mind always knew how to combine facts and conclusions into harmonious wholes that were nothing short of beautiful. Many among my flock found his sermons poetic."
"His mind has always been able to combine facts and conclusions into harmonious wholes that were nothing short of beautiful. Many among my flock found his sermons poetic."
"His mind has always been able to combine facts and conclusions into harmonious wholes that were nothing short of beautiful. Many among my flock found his sermons poetic."

languages.text: "Sein Verstand beherrschte es schon immer, Fakten und Schlussfolgerungen zu einem harmonischen Ganzen zusammenzufügen, das einfach nur wunderschön ist. Viele aus meiner Gemeinde fanden seine Predigten poetisch."
languages.original_text: "His mind has always been able to combine facts and conclusions into harmonious wholes that were nothing short of beautiful. Many among my flock found his sermons poetic."

traits.locale_text: "Sein Verstand beherrschte es schon immer, Fakten und Schlussfolgerungen zu einem harmonischen Ganzen zusammenzufügen, das einfach nur wunderschön ist. Viele aus meiner Gemeinde fanden seine Predigten poetisch."

languages.text: « Son esprit a toujours su combiner faits et conclusions en des ensembles harmonieux absolument sublimes. Nombre des miens trouvaient ses sermons extrêmement poétiques. »
languages.original_text: "His mind has always been able to combine facts and conclusions into harmonious wholes that were nothing short of beautiful. Many among my flock found his sermons poetic."

traits.locale_text: « Son esprit savait toujours combiner faits et conclusions en des ensembles harmonieux absolument sublimes. Nombre des miens trouvaient ses sermons extrêmement poétiques. »

languages.text: “他头脑敏锐，知道如何将事实与结论整合成和谐融洽、充满美感的整体，我的许多教友都认为他的布道颇有诗意。”
languages.original_text: "His mind has always been able to combine facts and conclusions into harmonious wholes that were nothing short of beautiful. Many among my flock found his sermons poetic."

traits.locale_text: “他头脑敏锐，知道如何将事实与结论整合成和谐融洽、充满美感的整体，我的许多教友都认为他的布道颇有诗意。”

languages.text: 「彼の精神はいつだって、事実と結論を、美しいと言わざるを得ぬ調和のとれた全体へと結びつける術を知っていた。私の群れの多くは、彼の説教を詩のようだと感じていた」
languages.original_text: "His mind has always been able to combine facts and conclusions into harmonious wholes that were nothing short of beautiful. Many among my flock found his sermons poetic."

traits.locale_text: 「彼の精神は常に、事実と結論を、美しいと言わざるを得ぬ調和のとれた全体へと結びつける術を知っていた。私の群れの多くは、彼の説教を詩のようだと感じていた」

languages.text: «Su mente siempre ha sabido cómo combinar hechos y conclusiones en conjuntos armoniosos realmente hermosos. Muchos de mi rebaño encontraban poéticos sus sermones».
languages.original_text: "His mind has always been able to combine facts and conclusions into harmonious wholes that were nothing short of beautiful. Many among my flock found his sermons poetic."

traits.locale_text: «Su mente siempre sabía cómo combinar hechos y conclusiones en conjuntos armoniosos realmente hermosos. Muchos de mi rebaño encontraban poéticos sus sermones».

languages.text: "Zihni her zaman gerçekleri ve çıkarımları bir araya getirip muazzam güzellikte, ahenkli bütünler yaratabiliyordu. Cemaatimin çoğu mensubu, vaazlarını şairane bulurdu."
languages.original_text: "His mind has always been able to combine facts and conclusions into harmonious wholes that were nothing short of beautiful. Many among my flock found his sermons poetic."

traits.locale_text: "Zihni her zaman gerçekleri ve çıkarımları bir araya getirip muazzam güzellikte, ahenkli bütünler yaratabiliyordu. Çevremdeki çoğu kişi söylevlerini şairane buluyor."
